message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be highly valuable to your business, potentially even more so than its worth to me. I'm confident it can generate substantial returns for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1250000, which is a price that allows me to make a good profit while still being a significant bargain for you, given its potential value to your operation. Consider this a strategic investment with a high potential for return.  Let me know if you're interested.
